lines: 1. Mbuya komwegena Yeso,Ase ring'ana riaye,"Gwanch' eira na komanya",Otebir' Omonene.
Yeso naki mwegenete,Moenekie botambe;Yeso, Yes'Omuya Yeso,Nimente komomanya.
2. O mbuya kwegena Yeso,'S' amanying' agosibia,'S' okwegena nantobeke,'S' amanying' okogwenia.
3. Mbuya komwegena Yeso,ntig'ebibe kegima,'Se Yeso nyor'obogima,motimoko mogoko.
4. Nagokire nkwegenete,'Muya Yes' Omosani,Namanyire nore nainche,Nobe nainche botambe.
